docs.snippet: Los Angeles County officials have filed documents seeking to become the guardian of a California man with dementia who was found disoriented and alone at a British bus station two years ago and became the subject of a TV documentary, according to ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Los Angeles County officials have filed documents seeking to become the guardian of a California man with dementia who was found disoriented and alone at a British bus station two years ago and became the subject of a TV documentary, according to a newspaper report.

headline.main: Officials Seek Custody of Man With Dementia Found in Britain
headline.print_headline: Officials Seek Custody of Man With Dementia Found in Britain

docs.snippet: A bear paces around a filthy cage next to a starving lion, the only two animals left in Mosul's zoo. At the edge of their tiny enclosures lies a lioness dead from starvation....

docs.snippet: House Democratic Leader Nancy Pelosi called President Donald Trump's chief strategist a white supremacist Thursday, saying he has no business serving on the National Security Council....

docs.snippet: The massacre at a Quebec City mosque left Canada in shock but it has also unified the country in solidarity with the Muslim community, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said Thursday at the funeral for three of the six men killed in the attack....
docs.lead_paragraph: The massacre at a Quebec City mosque left Canada in shock but it has also unified the country in solidarity with the Muslim community, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said Thursday at the funeral for three of the six men killed in the attack.

headline.main: Trudeau Says Canada in Shock, but United After Mosque Attack
headline.print_headline: Trudeau Says Canada in Shock, but United After Mosque Attack

docs.snippet: A New York state appeals court on Thursday said its door remains open for settlements of merger litigation where shareholders receive no money, approving an accord tied to Verizon Communications Inc's $130 billion buyout of Vodafone Group Plc's st...
docs.lead_paragraph: A New York state appeals court on Thursday said its door remains open for settlements of merger litigation where shareholders receive no money, approving an accord tied to Verizon Communications Inc's $130 billion buyout of Vodafone Group Plc's stake in their Verizon Wireless venture.

headline.main: New York Court Approves Verizon Settlement Over 'Merger Tax' Objections
headline.print_headline: New York Court Approves Verizon Settlement Over 'Merger Tax' Objections

docs.snippet: The CEOs of the three largest U.S. airlines have asked to meet with Secretary of State Rex Tillerson to discuss allegations that Gulf states are unfairly subsidizing state-owned carriers, driving down prices and crowding out competition on key rou...
docs.lead_paragraph: The CEOs of the three largest U.S. airlines have asked to meet with Secretary of State Rex Tillerson to discuss allegations that Gulf states are unfairly subsidizing state-owned carriers, driving down prices and crowding out competition on key routes, accusations those carriers deny.

headline.main: U.S. Airline CEOs Ask to Meet With Tillerson on Gulf Carriers
headline.print_headline: U.S. Airline CEOs Ask to Meet With Tillerson on Gulf Carriers

docs.snippet: Protests at the University of California, Berkeley, forced the cancellation of a speech by the right-wing writer Milo Yiannopoulos on Wednesday. He responded with his own video posted to YouTube later that night, saying that the left had become an...
docs.lead_paragraph: Protests at the University of California, Berkeley, forced the cancellation of a speech by the right-wing writer Milo Yiannopoulos on Wednesday. He responded with his own video posted to YouTube later that night, saying that the left had become antithetical to free speech. President Trump also weighed in with a tweet.
